lead_paragraph: ROSENBERG--Matthew. Loving and devoted husband of Sally, father of Larry (Louise) and Alison (Evan) and grandfather of Charlotte, Tess, Milo and Paisley. Passed away on March 5 and will be sadly missed. 1/3
